1360:12: amalayā vācetiṣa........[pauryādinā] amalaiḥ padairiti yuktaiḥ sahitairiti vistaraḥ|
1360:13: na hi vinā vācā padavyañjanairartho vibhāvayituṃ śakyata iti|
1360:31: vivṛta iha sa dharmaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti||2||
1360:32: anena ślokena pañcabhirdṛṣṭāntaiḥ sa hi dharmaḥ pañcavidhamarthamadhikṛtya deśitaḥ sādhyaṃ vyutpādyaṃ cintyamacintyaṃ pariniṣpannaṃ cādhigamārthaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ bodhipakṣasvabhāvam|
1360:35: yadā sa dharmaḥ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ so'laṃkriyata ityasya codyasya parihārārthaṃ tṛtīyaḥ ślokaḥ|
1360:41: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣayā prakṛtyaiva guṇavat ādarśagataṃ darśanavaśādviśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayatyevaṃ sa dharmaḥ subhāṣitaiḥ prakṛtyaiva guṇayukto'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthastuṣṭiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ janayati|
1360:43: ataḥ paraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaistasmindharme trividhamanuśaṃsaṃ darśayatyādarotpādanārtham|
1360:56: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kutastasyāyamanuśaṃso bhaviṣyatītyatra vipratipannāstasya buddhavacanatvaprasādhanārthaṃ kāraṇavibhājyamārabhya ślokaḥ|
1360:61: samapravṛtteḥ samakālaṃ ca śrāvakayānena mahāyānasya pravṛttirupalabhyate na paścāditi kathamasyābuddhavacanatvaṃ vijñāyate|
1360:68: sa eva buddho yo'bhisaṃbudhya evaṃ bhāṣate|
1360:69: bhāvābhāve 'bhāvādyadi mahāyānaṃ kiṃcidasti tasya bhāva[ve] siddhamidaṃ buddhavacanamato'nyasya mahāyānasyābhāvāt|
1360:71: śrāvakayānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ na mahāyānamiti na yujyate vinā buddhayānena buddhānāmanutpādāt|
1360:73: bhāvyamānaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ sarvanirvikalpajñānāśrayatvena kleśānāṃ pratipakṣo bhavati tasmād buddhavacanam|
1360:76: yaduktamādāvavyākaraṇādityanābhogādetadanāgatāṃ bhagavatā na vyākṛtamiti kasyacit syādata upekṣāyā ayoge ślokaḥ|
1360:80: tribhiḥ kāraṇairanāgatasya mahataḥ śāsanopadravasyopekṣā na yujyate|
1360:81: buddhānāmayatnato jñānapravṛtteḥ pratyakṣacakṣuṣkatayā śāsanarakṣāyāśca[yāṃ ca] yatnavatvāt|
1360:84: etadeva śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānametenaiva mahābodhiprāptiriti kasyacitsyādataḥ śrāvakayānasya mahāyānatvāyoge ślokaḥ|
1360:88: na hi śrāvakayāne kaścitparārtha upadiṣṭaḥ śrāvakāṇāmātmano nirvidvirāgavimuktimātropāyopadeśāt|
1360:89: na ca svārtha eva pareṣūpadiśyamānaḥ parārtho bhavitumarhati|
1360:91: svārthe hi paro niyujyamānaḥ svārtha eva prayujyate sa ātmana eva parinirvāṇārthaprayukto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyata iti viruddhametat|
1360:92: na ca śrāvakayānenaiva cirakālaṃ bodhau ghaṭamāno buddho bhavitumarhati|
1360:94: anupāyo hi śrāvakayānaṃ buddhatvasya na cānupāyena ciramapi prayujyamānaḥ prārthitamarthaṃ prāpnoti|
1360:98: na hi sa tādṛśa upadeśa etasminnupalabhyate|
1360:99: viruddhameva cānyonyaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānaṃ cetyanyonyavirodhe ślokaḥ|
1360:101: upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnameva tat||10||
1360:108: tasmādanyonyavirodhād yad yānaṃ hīnaṃ hīnameva tat|
1360:110: buddhavacanasyedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yatsūtre'vatarati vinaye saṃdṛśyate dharmatāṃ ca na vilomayati|
1360:117: avataratyevedaṃ svasmin mahāyānasūtre svasya ca kleśasya[kleśaḥ ?
1360:122: na dharmatāṃ vilomayatyathaiva hi dharmatā mahābodhiprāptaye tasmānnāsti lakṣaṇavirodhaḥ|
1360:135: atha mahāyānaṃ kathamupāyo yukta ityupāyatvayoge ślokaḥ|
1360:144: ye punarasmāt trasanti tadarthamasthānatrāsādīnave kāraṇatvena ślokaḥ|
1360:155: yena ca kāraṇena yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tat saṃdarśayati|
1360:156: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇe tu satīti caturvidhaṃ trāsakāraṇaṃ darśayati|
1360:157: gotraṃ cāsya na bhavati sanmitraṃ vā avyutpannamatirvā bhavati mahāyānadharmatāyāṃ pūrvaṃ vānupacitaśubho bhavati|
1360:168: atha śrāvakayānameva mahāyānaṃ syādanyasya śrāvakasya pratyekabuddhasya vābhāvaḥ syāt|
1360:177: bahumukhādabhīkṣṇaṃ cātra śūnyatā kathyate bahumiśca paryāyaisteṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu tasmādbhavitavyamatra mahatā prayojanena|
1360:179: yathākhyānaṃ nārthāt na cāsya yathārutamartho 'smādapi trāso na yuktaḥ|
1360:181: evaṃ yoniśaḥ pravicayādviduṣāṃ trāso na bhavati|
1360:183: śrutaṃ niśrityādau prabhavati manaskāra iha yo
1360:187: śrutaṃ niśrityādau manaskāraḥ prabhavati yo yoniśa ityarthaḥ|
1360:188: yoniśo manaskārāttattvārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prabhavati lokottarā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ,
1360:192: kathamasati tasminneṣā vyavasitirniścayo bhavati naivedaṃ buddhavacanamitie|
1360:194: ahaṃ na boddhā na gabhīraboddhā buddhau gabhīraṃ kimatarkagamyam|
1360:195: kasmād gabhīrārthavidāṃ ca mokṣa ityetaduttrāsapadaṃ na yuktam||17||
1360:199: ] rasya padārthasya na boddhā sa kiṃ gabhīraṃ deśayiṣyatītyuttrāsapadam,
1360:203: atha kasmād gabhīrārthavidāmeva mokṣo na tārkikāṇāmityuttrāsapadam,
1360:211: tataśca hīna eva dhātuḥ samudāgata ālayavijñānabhāvanā|
1360:219: kāmaṃ tāvadadhimuktirna syādaśrutānāṃ tu sūtrāntānāmaviśeṣeṇa pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ|
1360:220: śrutānusāreṇaiva hi buddhimattvaṃ labdhvā yaḥ śruta evāvajñāṃ karoti mūḍhaḥ sa satyevāvaśiṣṭe śrute vicitre cāprameye ca kutaḥ kāraṇānniścayameti na tadbuddhavacanamiti|
1360:221: na hi tasya śrutādanyabdalamasti tasmādaśrutvā pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ|
1360:222: yadapi ca śrutaṃ tadyoniśo manasi kartavyaṃ nāyoniśa ityayoniśomanasikārādīnave ślokaḥ|
1360:230: dharmasya ca svākhyātatāṃ pratikṣipati tannidānaṃ cāpuṇyaprabhāvāt kṣatiṃ prāpnoti|
1360:231: dharme ca pratighātamāvaraṇaṃ ca dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmetyayamatrādīnavaḥ|
1360:232: ayathāvataścā[ayathārutañcā]rthamavijānato'pi pratighāto na yukta iti pratighātāyoge ślokaḥ|
